features: Attain the perfect ft with 10 cm/4 in of torso adjustability
Customize the Thule VersaClick compatible hipbelt with any of the interchangeable Thule VersaClick accessories (most sold separately)
Conveniently store trekking poles on your hipbelt without taking o? your pack using the included Thule VersaClick Pole Holder
Gear stays dry during storms with high-visibility, removable rain cover
Quickly access often-used gear through front shove-it pocket, accessible from both inside and outside of bag
Stay cool with breathable shoulder straps, hipbelt padding and back panel
Stay hydrated with reservoir sleeve, drink tube exit port and two side water bottle pockets (hydration reservoir sold separately)
Easily secure hiking poles or ice axes on attachment loops that stow away when not in use
Store small items in zippered lid and hipbelt pockets
